description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the dataset.

risk_data_type.title: Risk data type
risk_data_type.description: The type of risk data included in the dataset, from the closed [risk data type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#risk-data-type).

organization.description: Name of organization that published the dataset

version.title: Dataset version
version.description: The version indicator (name or identifier) of the dataset.

purpose.title: Dataset purpose
purpose.description: The purpose for which the dataset was created.

project.title: Project title
project.description: The name of the project that produced the dataset.

spatial.title: Spatial coverage
spatial.description: The geographical area covered by the dataset.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Information about the resources included in the dataset.

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis, probabilistic or deterministic

geo_area.description: The name of the geographic area covered by the hazard analysis. Comma-separated list of geographic names.

time_start.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) starts [ISO 8601 format]

time_end.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) ends [ISO 8601 format]

time_span.description: The extent of the time period covered by the events included in the current scenario hazard analysis [ISO 8601 format]

time_year.description: General reference year to which the scenario refers to (e.g. '2050')

calculation_method.description: The methodology used for the calculation of this event

return_period.description: Probability of occurrence expressed as return periods list (10, 100, 1000) or range (10-1000)

occurence_time_start.description: The start date (and possibly time) of the time period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability [ISO 8601 format]

occurence_time_end.description: The end date (and possibly time) of the time period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability [ISO 8601 format]

occurence_time_span.description: The duration (years) of the period used to specify either the frequency or the occurrence_probability

trigger_hazard_type.description: Hazard type that triggered the event

trigger_process_type.description: Process type that triggered the event

description.description: Provides additional information about this specific event

data_uncertainty.description: Comments about the uncertainty of data

occupancy.description: Destination of use of the asset

occupancy_time.description: Period of occupancy, if appliable (e.g. Population)

taxonomy_source.description: Name of taxonomy source (default is GED4ALL)

taxonomy_code.description: Alphanumeric code for the taxonomy source (based on GED4ALL)

time_year.description: General reference year to which the scenario refers to (e.g. '2050')

add_attributes.description: List of key attributes included in the dataset

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability dataset metadata
vulnerability.description: Metadata that is specific to datasets that describe the physical fragility and vulnerability relationships in relation to specific hazards or combinations of individual hazards.

time_start.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) starts [ISO 8601 format]

time_end.description: The time at which the modelled scenario(s) ends [ISO 8601 format]

time_year.description: General reference year to which the scenario refers to (e.g. '2050')

occupancy.description: Destination of use of the asset

return_period.description: Probability of occurrence expressed as return periods list (10, 100, 1000) or range (10-1000)

calculation_method.description: The methodology used for the calculation of this event

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: An individual file or other form of data. Resources can be fully informationally equivalent, such as CSV and JSON serializations of the same data. Resources can also have different levels of fidelity, such as a CSV file and a graphical representation of the data within the file. Resources can also differ in other aspects, such as the temporal coverage of each resource.

id.title: Resource identifier
id.description: A locally unique identifier for this resource.

media_type.title: Media type
media_type.description: The media type of the resource, from the open [media_type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#media_type). For example a custom binary file has media_type 'application/octet-stream. A geojson file has the media_type 'application/geo+json'.

format.title: Format
format.description: A human-readable descripton of the file format of the resource, taken from the open [data formats codelist]((https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#data_formats).

spatial_resolution.title: Spatial resolution
spatial_resolution.description: The minimum spatial separation resolvable in the resource, measured in meters.

coordinate_system.title: Reference coordinate system
coordinate_system.description: The reference co-ordinate system of the dataset version, using the [EPSG codelist](https://epsg.org).

url.title: Url
url.description: The web address the dataset version can be downloaded from.

temporal.title: Temporal coverage
temporal.description: The period of time covered by this resource.

start.title: Start
start.description: The start of the period. A date (YYYY-MM-DD) is recommended. However, year-months (YYYY-MM) and years (YYYY) are supported.

end.title: End date
end.description: The end of the period. A date (YYYY-MM-DD) is recommended. However, year-months (YYYY-MM) and years (YYYY) are supported.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the period in ISO 8601 duration format, e.g. 'P50Y' for 50 years

countries.title: Countries
countries.description: The countries covered by the geographical area, from the closed [country codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#country).

gazetteerEntries.title: Gazetteer entries
gazetteerEntries.description: Entries from geographical indices or directories describing the geographical area. This field should be used to describe subnational coverage. Use of ISO 3166-2 is recommended.

bbox.title: Bounding box
bbox.description: A geographic bounding box delimiting the geographical area.

geometry.title: Geometry
geometry.description: A set of coordinates denoting the vertices of the geographical area.

centroid.title: Centroid
centroid.description: The coordinates of the centre of the geographical area.

scale.title: Spatial scale
scale.description: The administrative spatial scale the modelled scenario(s) applies to, from the closed [spatial scale codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#spatial_scale).

Gazetteer_entry.title: Gazetteer entry
Gazetteer_entry.description: An entry from a geographical index or directory describing a geographical area.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: An identifier drawn from the gazetteer identified in `.scheme`.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The gazetteer from which the entry is drawn, from the open [location gazetteers codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#location_gazetteers).

description.title: Description
description.description: A description for the gazetteer entry.

uri.title: Uniform resource locator
uri.description: A URI for the gazetteer entry.

Geometry.title: Geometry
Geometry.description: A set of coordinates denoting the vertices of the geographical area.

type.title: Type
type.description: The GeoJSON geometry type that is described by `.coordinates`, from the closed [geometry_type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#geometry_type).

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description: One or more GeoJSON positions according to the GeoJSON geometry type defined in `.type`.

Vulnerability.title: vulnerability
Vulnerability.description: Metadata that is specific to datasets that describe the physical fragility and vulnerability relationships in relation to specific hazards or combinations of individual hazards.

hazard_primary.title: Primary hazard type
hazard_primary.description: The primary hazard involved in the modelled scenario(s), from the closed [hazard type codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#hazard_type).

hazard_secondary.title: Secondary hazard type
hazard_secondary.description: The secondary hazard involved in the modelled scenario(s), from the closed [hazard type codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#hazard_type).

hazard_process_primary.title: Primary hazard process
hazard_process_primary.description: The primary hazard process involved in the modelled scenario(s), from the closed [hazard process type codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#hazard_process_type).

hazard_process_secondary.title: Secondary hazard process
hazard_process_secondary.description: The secondary hazard process involved in the modelled scenario(s), from the closed [hazard process type codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#hazard_process_type).

hazard_analysis_type.title: Hazard analysis type
hazard_analysis_type.description: The type of analysis applied to the hazard data used in the modelled scenario(s), from the closed [analysis type codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#analysis_type).

intensity.title: Hazard intensity measurement
intensity.description: The metric and units the hazard intensity measurement is given in, from the open [IMT codelist]https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists.html#IMT).

category.title: Exposure category
category.description: The category of the exposed assets, from the closed [exposure category codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#exposure_category).

cost.title: Asset cost
cost.description: The exposure costs associated with specific elements of assets detailed in the dataset.

taxonomy.title: Exposure taxonomy scheme
taxonomy.description: The name of the taxonomy scheme used to create descriptive individual asset feature strings within the dataset. Use of GED4ALL is recommended.

impact.title: Vulnerability impact
impact.description: The details of the vulnerability impact values produced in the modelled scenario(s).

spatial.title: Vulnerability spatial details
spatial.description: Spatial details of the dataset. `.scale` must be provided, other properties of `Location` can be included if they are different from those already detailed in the top level `spatial` object.

functions.title: Vulnerability functions
functions.description: Details of the functions used to calculate the vulnerability dataset.

vulnerability_function.title: Vulnerability function
vulnerability_function.description: The vulnerability function used to calculate the impact of the hazard.

fragility.title: Fragility function
fragility.description: The fragility function used to calculate the impact of the hazard.

damage_to_loss.title: Damage-to-loss function
damage_to_loss.description: The damage-to-loss function (or damage-to-loss model) used to calculate the impact of the hazard in conjunction with a fragility function.

engineering_demand.title: Engineering demand function
engineering_demand.description: The engineering damand function used to calculate the impact of the hazard.

analysis_details.title: Analysis details
analysis_details.description: Additional details about the analysis used to produce the vulnerability function used in the modelled scenario(s).

se_category.title: Socio-economic index category
se_category.description: The category used to classify the socio-economic category vulnerable to the hazard.

Vulnerability_function.title: Vulnerability function
Vulnerability_function.description: Details of a vulnerability function used to calculate the impact of the hazard.

approach.title: Impact function approach
approach.description: The approach the impact function is based upon, taken from the closed [function approach codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#function_approach).

relationship.title: Impact relationship type
relationship.description: The type of function relationships used to calculate the impact values, taken from the closed [relationship type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#relationship_type).

relationship.description: The type of function relationships used to calculate the impact values, taken from the closed [relationship type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#relationship_type).

damage_scale_name.title: Damage scale name
damage_scale_name.description: The name of the damage scale used in the damage-to-loss function or fragility function, taken from the open [damage scale name codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#damage_scale_name).

damage_states_names.title: Damage states names
damage_states_names.description: The names of the damage states listed in a Damage Scale or used in a Fragility function, taken from the open [damage states names codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#damage_states_names).

unit.title: Impact unit

base_data_type.title: Impact base data type
base_data_type.description: The type of data used to calculate the impact values, taken from the closed [data calculation type codelist](https://rdl-standard.readthedocs.io/en/{{version}}/data_model/codelists/#data_calculation_type).

Se_category.title: Socio-economic index category
Se_category.description: The category used to classify the socio-economic category vulnerable to the hazard.

description.title: Socio-economic index description
description.description: The name or title of the socio-economic index category.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The name of the schema the socio-economic index category is taken from. Use of either [GED4ALL](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/GED4ALL#Socio-Economic) or [Mover](https://www.gfdrr.org/en/publication/mover) is recommended.
